    Talks and presentations

    Some algorithms for procedural generation of biology

    October 29, 2025

    Short presentation, ICAR Team, LIRMM, Montpellier, France

    The ICAR research team often propose to present a random subject during what we called “speech lunches”. Here I presented the four random algorithms for “digital growth”:

    • Reaction-diffusion for the generation of Turing patterns,
    • Diffusion-Limited Aggregation for dendritic patterns,
    • L-system for fractal plant growth,
    • Space colonization for constrainted tree modelling.

    Bio-inspired algorithm using particles

    February 26, 2025

    Short presentation, Groupe Graphique, LIRMM, Montpellier, France

    I like to present random works for our small research group. Here, I presented a short introduction to particle systems for bio-inspired algorithm:

    • Boids (link to a web demo),
    • Particle Swarm Optimisation (link to a web demo with a comparison to gradient descent),
    • Snake: Active Contours (link to a web demo),
    • Ant Colony Optimisation (link to a web demo)

    Flexible Terrain Erosion Compatible with Multiple Representations

    June 28, 2024

    Conference presentation, CGI 2024, Geneva, Switzerland

    I presented my work on terrain erosion at CGI 2024 conference in Geneva, Switzerland:

    Cellular automata: a brief history

    February 15, 2024

    Short presentation, Groupe Graphique, LIRMM, Montpellier, France

    I like to present random works for our small research group. Here, I presented briefly the history of cellular automata and its current state in academia and industry.

    Aperiodic tiling: the einstein

    February 15, 2024

    Short presentation, ICAR Team, LIRMM, Montpellier, France

    The ICAR research team often propose to present a random subject during what we called “speech lunches”. Here I presented the Einstein and the Spectre, an aperiodic unique tile:

    Visiting Purdue University

    November 27, 2023

    Team presentation, Purdue University, Lafayette, Indiana, USA

    I spend a month at Purdue University, Indiana, USA. Here, I presented the current state of my work.

    Journees Francaises d’Informatique Graphique 2023

    November 08, 2023

    Conference presentation, JFIG 2023, Montpellier, France

    In the Journées Françaises d’Informatique Graphique of 2023 held in Montpellier, France, I presented a part of my work about Terrain generation through iterative process. The goal of this conference as students is to share current progress in different fields, get feedbacks from experts and other students, and more immportantly, learn to speak with a large public. The work presented is seldom published.

    Visiting IRIT

    February 10, 2023

    Team presentation, IRIT, Toulouse, France

    I spend few months in the STORM team in IRIT labs, Toulouse, France. Here, I presented the current state of my work.

    Journees Francaises d’Informatique Graphique 2022

    November 23, 2022

    Conference presentation, JFIG 2022, Bordeaux, France

    In the Journées Françaises d’Informatique Graphique of 2022 held in Bordeaux, France, I presented a part of my work about Terrain erosion. The goal of this conference as students is to share current progress in different fields, get feedbacks from experts and other students, and more immportantly, learn to speak with a large public. The work presented is seldom published.
